message: Let's split somewhat fairly, Bob, but account for me going first.
Your turn, Alice. Let's be fair - we should each get half after accounting for the round 1 discount.
Bob, I want to be fair, but time is also money! This is a slight improvement on your offer, factoring in another round of inflation.
Alice, this is getting ridiculous. I'm offering you the same deal you offered me, adjusted for inflation.
